name: Speedrun & Co.
description:
Hi, we're Speedrun & Co, and we want You to be our special speedrunner. Use all the bugs glitches to lessen your time! Play through levels at the desire of your fingertips, or play all of the levels in a random shuffle. We are watching.

Lol

The first public demo is just 5 levels, and once you finish the fifth level, you get taken back to the first. So it's basically an infinite loop right now. The game has no sound yet, and expect bugs too. (If you find a game breaking  bug please message us about that).

(Android apks for computer androids like chromebooks)
